english.segment1: Tally-tally ho, tally-tally ho-ho. My eye's on the mark and we're taking it home. Tally-tally ho, tally-tally ho-ho. Fire in the air and we're taking it home
english.segment2: Pouring out the gasoline, ignite the fumes (wo-oh). Sweet taste of victory in view
english.segment3: Tally-tally ho, tally-tally ho-ho. My eye's on the mark and we're taking it home (hey). Tally-tally ho, tally-tally ho-ho. Fire in the air and we're taking it home
english.segment4: Won't get the best of me, you never do (wo-oh). This clash is long-time overdue
english.segment5: Tally-tally ho, tally-tally ho-ho. My eye's on the mark and we're taking it home. Tally-tally ho, tally-tally ho-ho. Fire in the air and we're taking it home
english.segment6: Tally-tally ho, tally-tally ho-ho. My eye's on the mark and we're taking it home. Tally-tally ho, tally-tally ho-ho. Fire in the air and we're taking it home
